metadata.title: CVE-2023-37203 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation in the Drag and Drop API in conjunction with socialengineering, may have allowed an attacker to trick end-users into creatinga shortcut to local system files. This could have been leveraged to executearbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 115.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
